actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to empower the Secretary of Commerce to permit certain personnel to carry firearms and to make arrests.

summary.text: Empowers the Secretary of Commerce to authorize Department of Commerce employees who guard premises under the responsibility of the Secretary: (1) to carry firearms in the performance of their duties; and (2) to make arrests for offenses against the United States committed in their presence, or for which they have reasonable grounds to believe the person to be arrested is responsible.

titles.title: A bill to empower the Secretary of Commerce to permit certain personnel to carry firearms and to make arrests.
